Jirafeau is setting the website accordin: Jirafeau is setting the website according to the configuration you provided.
The base address of Jirafeau is the firs: The base address of Jirafeau is the first part of the URL, until (and including) the last slash. For example: "http://www.example.com/". Do not forget the trailing slash!
The data directory is where your files a: The data directory is where your files and information about your files will be stored. You should put it outside your web site, or at least restrict the access to this directory. Do not forget the trailing slash!
Jirafeau is internationalised. Choose a: Jirafeau is internationalised. Choose a specific langage or choose Automatic (langage is provided by user's browser).
Jirafeau has an administration interface: Jirafeau has an administration interface (through admin.php). You can set a password to access the interface or leave it empty to disable the interface.
